component.name: LightkeeperRM
component.summary: A standalone, customizable server management tool

description.p:
LightkeeperRM is a standalone, customizable, modular, server management tool. It works as a drop-in replacement for maintaining servers over SSH with shell commands.
This is still an early release. There will be some bugs and features missing.
See project website for more information.
